verify.title: Verify
verify.subtitle: We've sent the verification email to

region.title: Regional preferences
region.subtitle: Select your preferred language, currency and country for appropriate regional formatting.

country.title: Country
country.subtitle: Choose your country for appropriate regional currency formatting.

currency.title: Currency
currency.subtitle: The currency of preferrence for this wallet. Your transactions and overviews will be in this currency.

language.title: Language
language.subtitle: We are working on providing more than English (US) as your language option.

export.title: Export
export.subtitle: Select your preferred file format for the exportation of data.

file.title: File Format
file.subtitle: We currently support Excel, Google Docs & Comma Separated Values (CSV).

connect.title: Connect With Your Bank
connect.description: Connect your bank account to import the transactions for the current month.

sync.title: Automatic Bank Account Syncs
sync.description: Automatically syncs with the bank account to obtain transactions every start of the month.

import.title: Import From Bank Statements
import.description: You can also import the transactions from your bank statements

empty.success: Oh! Snap! You don't have any transactions yet.

add.categoryerror: Chosen category is not valid. Please select a valid one.

get.unableerror: There was an error while fetching the transactions. Please try again later!

chart.empty: Please fill in adequare data to build a chart
chart.expense: Total Income & Total Overspent as a percentage of Total Expense
chart.income: Total Spent & Total Available as a percentage of Total Income

dynamic.fetcherror: Unable to fetch you budget at this moment. Please try again!

card.deleteerror: Unable to delete the budget. Please refresh and try again.

empty.hey: Hey, Looks like you need a budget for

dynamic.unableerror: Unable to create the budgets. Please refresh and try again!
dynamic.alreadyerror: The selected category already has a budget. Please choose a different category!
dynamic.changeerror: Unable to change the budget category at this moment. Please try again!
dynamic.allcategorieserror: You have a budget for all the categories!

connect.title: Connect
connect.description: You can connect with your family members to have a better overview of your finances.

reset.title: Reset account
reset.description: Your user account will remain, but all the data will be deleted so you can start from a blank slate. Consider exporting all your data.
reset.button: Reset my Blitz Budget user account

delete.title: Delete account
delete.description: Be careful. This will delete your user account and all the information you entered. We recommend that you export all your data.
delete.button: Delete my Blitz Budget user account
